name: BackupDirectory
description: Uses Robocopy to backup directories and files from a source to a destination.
author: Jungerius IT

inputs.name: source
inputs.label: Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source directory where files and folders will be copied from

inputs.name: destination
inputs.label: Destination folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Destination where the files will be copied to.

inputs.name: copyOptions
inputs.label: Robocopy options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Robocopy accepts a few command line options (e.g. /S /E /Z).

inputs.name: createStampedBackupFolder
inputs.label: Create stamped backup folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to True then it will create a dated backup folder under the destination folder (e.g. c:\backup\2014-05-11)
